name: HOMETOWN ZERO
description:
HOMETOWN ZERO Made for the GODOT Wild Jam #33.

As 9th Hour Films Games, we are proud to publish our first work, and participate in our first game jam. All of the sprites and most of the sounds/music were made during the GODOT Wild Jam period., as well as starting from scratch on a new GODOT project and scripts.

Note: All levels are beatable. There may be some boxes that are difficult to get to, and those are filled with cash to buy items for your room.

You play as a newcomer to a suburban town, only to find out that things lack meaning and coherence. You meet a "hero" who does favors for characters throughout the town. This hero has something special in his heart, and is going to great and amazing things. Unfortunately, he is scared and lacks motivation to do his work.

  • Talk to prairie dogs
  • Experience the drone bots
  • Buy posters and items for your room
  • Get Fiddy's Pick and Guitar

[CONTROLS]

Can change keybinds in the Computer menu (Controller not supported!)

Default Keys:

W : Jump

A : Left

S : Fall

D : Right

F : Use / Push Boxes
